entry.source: Let's go {F804,5}kill Kenji at Camp Ichigaya.{F804,0} Tokyo{F801}doesn't need two kings, after all. Word is that{F801}Kenji was a badass when he was human, but I bet{F801}he wasn't even close to me. Still, if the rumors{F801}are true, he's probably gotten even stronger now{F801}that he's a demonoid. But I'm sure you'll be{F801}fine... as the next King of Tokyo, I guarantee it.{F801}
